label: ham
subject:
Re: Disable the krb5 replay cache when ads_verify_ticket() call
	from winbindd_pam.c
body: 1201 (return) [ It is certain, however strange, that many nations have been ignorant of the use of fire. Even the ingenious natives of Otaheite, who are destitute of metals, have not invented any earthen vessels capable of sustaining the action of fire, and of communicating the heat to the liquids which they contain.]
